text: She is absolutely safe'he replied; but he turned, nevertheless, to the man who instructions on the matter. Vittoria stood looking about her, breathing the scent of thyme. The land at her feet sloped away into a tiny valley beyond which, on the crest of a wooded hill-side, the ruins of a small temple were etched against the clear blue of the sky.
